name: d3-canvas-transition
title: d3-canvas-transition
description: Animated transitions for D3 selections on svg and canvas
author: Luca Sbardella <luca@quantmind.com>

scripts.test: eslint index.js rollup.config.js src test && babel-tape-runner `find test -name '*-test.js'` | faucet
scripts.prepublish: npm run-script rollup && npm run-script minify
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git tag -am "Release $VERSION." v${VERSION} && git push --tags && mkdir -p ../giottojs.org/latest && mkdir -p ../giottojs.org/d3-canvas-transition/${VERSION} && cp build/* ../giottojs.org/d3-canvas-transition/${VERSION}/ && cp build/* ../giottojs.org/latest/ && cd ../giottojs.org && git add d3-canvas-transition/${VERSION} latest && git commit -a -m "d3-canvas-transition ${VERSION}" && git push
